short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows Zen's Chrome users to view their bandwidth usage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows Zen Internet broadband customers to view their broadband usage via a browser action button.

Please note: this is an unofficial port of the FireFox "Zen Broadband Usage Viewer", I have no connection to Zen Internet.

Any issues may be reported to the GitHub bug tracker: https://github.com/frozeng/zen-chrome-extension
